text: LaWanna "Lou" Shurtliff (June 13, 1935 - December 30, 2020) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the Utah House of Representatives from 1999 through 2008 and from 2019 until her death. Shurtliff was born in Lincoln County, Wyoming. Shurtliff died of pneumonia in Ogden, Utah on December 30, 2020 at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Wyoming Category:Politicians from Utah Category:People from Ogden, Utah Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: LaWanna Shurtliff
